Title: Frontline report: Russian soldier falls from high-rise building a...
Description: Amidst intense floor-by-floor fighting in Toretsk's high-rises, a Russian soldier fell to his death from the sixth floor while attempting to escape via balconies. Russian plans to swiftly advance through Toretsk in Donetsk Oblast and divide the city have been thwarted by unexpectedly strong Ukrainian resistance.

Description: NATO officials expect Rutte to focus on rallying support for Ukraine, ensuring unity within the alliance, addressing Eastern European allies' demands for increased security.

Title: White House defies congressional mandate on Ukraine aid disclosur...
Description: The Biden administration has classified its Ukraine aid strategy document, contrary to congressional requirements for public disclosure, raising GOP lawmakers' concerns about the administration's transparency.

Title: Far-right pro-Russian party wins Austrian elections
Description: Austria's 2024 National Council election has resulted in a stunning victory for the Freedom Party of Austria (FPÖ), securing 29.2% of the vote according to preliminary results. It outpaced the current conservative People's Party (ÖVP), which received 26.5% of the votes.

Title: Denmark and Ukraine sign $ 629 mn arms procurement agreement
